statements: SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT subscription_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE subscription_id = 5 AND is_automatic = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC, payment_amount ASC;
SELECT id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE is_automatic = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE subscription_id = 100 AND payment_amount > 50;
SELECT payment_date, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 25 AND 75 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC;
SELECT id, subscription_id, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND payment_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Subscription WHERE subscription_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT subscription_id, user_id, billing_amount FROM Subscription ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT subscription_name, billing_amount, start_date, end_date FROM Subscription WHERE billing_amount > 50.00;
SELECT user_id, subscription_name, start_date, end_date FROM Subscription WHERE user_id='987e6543-f21c-45a7-b3c4-567890123456';
SELECT * FROM AutomaticPayment WHERE status='Pending' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Subscription WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT subscription_name, billing_amount FROM Subscription WHERE billing_amount > 100 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_subscriptions FROM Subscription;
SELECT user_id, billing_amount * 0.8 AS discounted_amount FROM Subscription;
SELECT start_date, end_date, payment_date FROM Subscription JOIN AutomaticPayment ON Subscription.subscription_id = AutomaticPayment.subscription_id ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM automatic_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT subscription_name, start_date, end_date, price FROM subscriptions WHERE user_id = '12345';
SELECT payment_id, subscription_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM automatic_payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM automatic_payments WHERE status = 'paid' AND payment_amount < 50;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 'uuid123' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT subscription_name, price FROM subscriptions WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, status FROM automatic_payments WHERE status = 'pending' AND payment_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, subscription_name, start_date FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_method FROM automatic_bill_payments WHERE payment_method = 'credit card';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT customer_id, subscription_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = '10b1c456-7d8e-4a1f-9c8e-b75aea2d6ed7'
SELECT * FROM automatic_bill_payments ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number = '123-456-7890'
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT subscription_name, start_date, end_date FROM Subscriptions;
SELECT user_id, payment_date, amount FROM Payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE user_id = 15;
SELECT * FROM AutoPayments ORDER BY next_payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT subscription_name, start_date, end_date FROM Subscriptions WHERE subscription_id > 100 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, phone_number FROM Users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;

SELECT username, subscription_name, payment_date, amount FROM Users INNER JOIN Subscriptions ON Users.user_id = Subscriptions.user_id INNER JOIN Payments ON Users.user_id = Payments.user_id WHERE amount >= 50 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT Users.username, BillingInfo.card_number, BillingInfo.billing_address FROM Users JOIN BillingInfo ON Users.user_id = BillingInfo.user_id WHERE BillingInfo.expiry_date > CURDATE();
